channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Danish startup FlatPay joins the club of European fintech unicorns to track
item.description: Flatpay’s bet is that it can challenge larger players by charging small merchants a flat transaction rate to use its card terminals and point-of-sales...

item.title: OpenAI's Fidji Simo Plans to Make ChatGPT Way More Useful—and Have You Pay For It
item.description: As OpenAI expands in every direction, the new CEO of Applications is on a mission to make ChatGPT indispensable and lucrative.

item.title: 11 Best Dry Shampoos for All Types of Hair (2025)
item.description: I spent months testing 30 dry shampoos on day-two hair and beyond—these are the most effective formulas you can buy.

item.title: 12 Best Tech Gifts That They'd Actually Want (2025)
item.description: Don't buy something for a loved one you wouldn't want for yourself. These are the hot tech products of 2025 that everyone will yearn for this holiday ...

item.title: Inside a Wild Bitcoin Heist: Five-Star Hotels, Cash-Stuffed Envelopes, and Vanishing Funds
item.description: Sophisticated crypto scams are on the rise. But few of them go to the lengths one bitcoin mining executive experienced earlier this year.

item.title: Amazon satellite network gets a rebrand — and drops its affordability pitch
item.description: The company has been quietly changing how it talks about who its internet customers will be before it announced a big name change last week.

item.title: ‘Buy Now, Pay Later’ is expanding fast, and that should worry everyone
item.description: As Morris watches his BNPL investments from the other side of the table, he seems to understand the warning signs better than most.

item.title: Best Organic Mattresses (2025): Birch, Avocado, Naturepedic, More
item.description: These natural, organic mattresses are eco-friendly alternatives to conventional models and just as comfortable.

item.title: Are we nearing the end of Apple’s Tim Cook era?
item.description: Apple is getting serious about succession planning, according to a new report.

item.title: Beloved SF cat’s death fuels Waymo criticism
item.description: The death of a neighborhood bodega cat named Kit Kat has shaken San Francisco’s Mission District and prompted new debates about robotaxi safety.
